overview: The introverted designer Qin Feng participated in the RV camping organized by his college friend Lu Yuan. He wanted to use this camping to express his love to his female classmate Yaoyao, who had a crush on him for many years. There are unprecedented monsters hidden in this seemingly peaceful forest. During the struggle with the monsters, Qin Feng finally expressed his love to Yaoyao, and finally escaped with Yaoyao.
title: Alien Monster
